name: 2022 11th International Conference on Innovation, Knowledge, and Management
content: PUBLICATION: All papers will be sent to at least two peer-reviewers for review. After a rigorous review process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published by Conference Publishing Services (CPS), and submitted to IEEE Xplore for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus Index Extended papers will be recommended to International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology for publication free of charge after peer review, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
